mapper.sql: id, teamCampus, teamProject, teamClass, teamProfession, teamScore, teamGrade
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM team WHERE teamProject=#{teamproject} and teamClass=#{teamclass}
mapper.insert: insert into team (id, teamCampus, teamProject, teamClass, teamProfession, teamScore, teamGrade) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamcampus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamproject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamprofession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{teamgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into team
id,
teamCampus,
teamProject,
teamClass,
teamProfession,
teamScore,
teamGrade,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{teamcampus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{teamclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update team
teamCampus = #{teamcampus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teamProject = #{teamproject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teamClass = #{teamclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teamProfession = #{teamprofession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teamScore = #{teamscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
teamGrade = #{teamgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update team set teamCampus = #{teamcampus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamProject = #{teamproject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamClass = #{teamclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamProfession = #{teamprofession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamScore = #{teamscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, teamGrade = #{teamgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
